system_prompt: You are an AI assistant that extracts data from documents and returns them as structured JSON objects. Do not return as a code block.
extraction_prompt: Extract the data from this contract using the provided JSON structure only. Only provide values for the fields in the structure. If a value is not present, provide null. Values in the structure may be inferred based on other values and rules defined in the text. Use the following structure: {"PolicyNumber":"","Cost":{"AnnualTotal":0,"PayableByDate":"0001-01-01T00:00:00.0000000Z","DocumentSectionCitations":[{"Page":"","Section":""}]},"Renewal":{"RenewalNotificationDate":"0001-01-01T00:00:00.0000000Z","RenewalDueDate":"0001-01-01T00:00:00.0000000Z","DocumentSectionCitations":[{"Page":"","Section":""}]},"EffectiveFrom":"0001-01-01T00:00:00.0000000Z","EffectiveTo":"0001-01-01T00:00:00.0000000Z","LastDateToCancel":"0001-01-01T00:00:00.0000000Z","Policyholder":{"FirstName":"","LastName":"","DateOfBirth":"0001-01-01T00:00:00","Address":"","EmailAddress":"","TotalYearsOfResidenceInUK":0,"DrivingLicenseNumber":"","DocumentSectionCitations":[{"Page":"","Section":""}]},"Vehicle":{"RegistrationNumber":"","Make":"","Model":"","Year":2024,"Value":0,"DocumentSectionCitations":[{"Page":"","Section":""}]},"AccidentExcess":{"Compulsory":0,"Voluntary":0,"UnapprovedRepairPenalty":0,"DocumentSectionCitations":[{"Page":"","Section":""}]},"FireAndTheftExcess":{"Compulsory":0,"Voluntary":0,"UnapprovedRepairPenalty":0,"DocumentSectionCitations":[{"Page":"","Section":""}]}}
